text:
Hello,

I think it would help to have the "LZMA" compression method
for the "tar" task.

Regards.
creator: jerome.bouat@wanadoo.fr

text: Anyone ever looked at this one?
creator: akurtakov@gmail.com

text:
I dont think anybody has provided any code for it, yet.

The best approach would likely be to contribute this to Apache commons-compress [1] and take advantage of it in the compress-antlib [2] which recasts Ant's compression tasks in terms of commons-compress.

If anybody wanted to reuse an existing Java lzma implementation the license terms must be considered.

[1] http://commons.apache.org/compress/

[2] http://ant.apache.org/antlibs/compress/index.html which is currently waiting for Commons Compress 1.1 to be released so it can have its first release itself.
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text: tracked as https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/COMPRESS-111 will become available to the compress antlib once implemented in commons compress.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
